name: Thai Corn Fritters (Easy Tod Man Khao Pod Recipe)
description: These Thai corn fritters are irresistibly crispy, perfectly spicy, and subtly sweet and salty.
recipeIngredient: 4  kaffir lime leaves (cut into thin strips)

itemListElement.text: In a large mixing bowl, combine crispy flour with corn.
itemListElement.name: In a large mixing bowl, combine crispy flour with corn.

itemListElement.text: Add fish sauce, strips of kaffir lime leaves, red curry paste, and egg. Thoroughly mix.
itemListElement.name: Add fish sauce, strips of kaffir lime leaves, red curry paste, and egg. Thoroughly mix.

itemListElement.text: Slowly add ice-cold water while mixing.
itemListElement.name: Slowly add ice-cold water while mixing.

itemListElement.text: Grab no more than a spoonful of the corn dough mixture.
itemListElement.name: Grab no more than a spoonful of the corn dough mixture.

itemListElement.text: Gently let it slide into a large, hot oil-filled deep-frying pan.
itemListElement.name: Gently let it slide into a large, hot oil-filled deep-frying pan.

itemListElement.text: After each scoop, rinse your spoon with water.
itemListElement.name: After each scoop, rinse your spoon with water.

itemListElement.text: Deep-fry the corn fritters until crisp and golden, turning them occasionally.
itemListElement.name: Deep-fry the corn fritters until crisp and golden, turning them occasionally.

itemListElement.text: Transfer to a colander or onto paper towels to drain excess oil. Serve and enjoy.
